text:
City Seasons Hotels Appoint a Seasoned Spa Specialist As Group Director
Isabelle Czinzoll has recently been appointed as Group Spa Director for City Seasons Hotels.
In her previous role, Isabelle was Spa Director at an international 5-star chain in Dubai and before that run the successful and award-winning spa at the prestigious Aviation Club.
Isabelle’s experience in the beauty and skin care field spans 20 years where she headed Internationally-branded Spas in UK and South Africa, working with high end products namely Guinot, Payot, Pevonia and Margy’s.
At City Seasons Hotels Isabelle will oversee the opening and launch of Alba Spa at the recently open Royal Rose Abu Dhabi hotel. Isabelle will also look after the other City Seasons properties’ spas in Dubai and Muscat with a projected spa to open in City Seasons Al Ain in the new year.
“We are pleased and happy to count Mrs. Czinzoll on our team, said Sheikh Ahmed Musallam Bin Ham, Vice President City Seasons Hotels. “She has an extensive knowledge in the spa field, and her deep understanding of spas and her leadership skills are sure elements for the success of Alba Spa in Royal Rose and the spas in other City Seasons Hotels.
Mrs. Czinzoll is British and before Dubai, has lived and worked in UK, South Africa and Switzerland.
About her new position, she says: “The Vision for Alba Spa is to turn it into a brand that will make a fantastic retreat for spa users. We have a great team of therapists, a wonderful line of products and we mostly have a beautiful space that is a sanctuary for beauty and well-being.”
